definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: There are 3 Rome Leonardo Da Vinci Airport lounges (Rome Fiumicino Airport lounges) within our program.
sentences.chinese: 我们在罗马机场有3间机场贵宾室。

sentences.english: Breakout rooms and mother-and-baby rooms are furnished like airport executive lounges.
sentences.chinese: 休息室和母婴室的陈设好像机场的行政贵宾室。

sentences.english: I just got to the airport and are currently waiting in the VIP room for my flight!
sentences.chinese: 我刚到机场，现在正在贵宾室等我的航班。

sentences.english: There are 4 Busan International Airport lounges within our program.
sentences.chinese: 我们在釜山机场有4间机场贵宾室。

sentences.english: There are 5 Jakarta Soekarno Hatta International Airport lounges within our program.
sentences.chinese: 我们在雅加达机场有5间机场贵宾室。

definition: box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
private room (in a restaurant, bath house, etc)
